nodes.text: Ilic Nadab was a male Mirialan general of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was dispatched to the Aurek Base on Hoth after his predecessor managed to lose a strategically important region of Clabburn Tundra. Nadab viewed the plateau as vital to Republic effort on Hoth and so dispatched a competent Republic citizen to combat the threat to Republic and Talz forces stationed there.
Ilic Nadab is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
